_sText:
This was the best way I found to achieve all achievements. Some complexive entities will make it easier to players to get those achievments as fast as they can. With this mappack, unlocking achievments will be cake, and you will get them way much faster than if you play other maps than these. ALMOST EVERY SINGLE ACHIEVEMENT!
Achievement_cooperation - main map - Multikill area - get a 4kill of any rifle in the 1HP lineup enemies area! - Bombsite area - plant and defuse bombs, this one will activate if both teams agree in pressing the two buttons at each spawn. - Hostages area - rescue more than 30 per round! - Normal play area - play normally like you would in a comun server, this can also be the place to try other stuff. - GODMODE area - call a friend and keep the firing button pressed, your friend won't die as long as you don't hit his head! (infinite ammo/health) - Cash area - need money? get it HERE! an automized system will set your cash to 16000 and back to 0, repeating this process until you reach the cash achievment. (uses mani admin and still not tested) - Props hole - Shoot the crates inside to get an achievement. Extra areas: - Healer - Buyzone
Achievement_bombing Eather join T if you want to plant the bomb, or CT if you want to defuse.
Achievement_easyround Add a CT bot automaticly win as many rounds as you want, just leave the server when you are finished.
Achievement_linedup Whats the best way to get weapon kills? THIS. Add CT bots and start the annihilation!
Achievement_massivekills Get those epic kill achievements, a simple grenade will trow the CT bots away!
Achievement_sknifed Sknifed - Kill a zoomed-in enemy sniper with a knife This is one of ten[+] achievements you can get in this level. Join T, add bots to CT and knife'em all!
Achievement_cash Get epic amounts of cash, doing absolutly nothing! (requires SourceMod installed, and it was not tested yet but I guess it should work)
- Is this safe? Well, its a map, how can it not be safe? - Where can I play these maps? connect to this 80.172.230.146:27015 and get some friends to play it with you. Hope you like it.
